com.smartitengineering.version.api
Interface VersionedResource

All Known Subinterfaces:
MutableVersionedResource
All Known Implementing Classes:
VersionedResourceImpl
public interface VersionedResource

This object represents an resource that is versioned. It provides easy access to versions of the resource.

Author:
imyousuf

Method Summary
 Resource getHeadVersionResource()
          Retrieve the content of object from the HEAD revision.
 java.util.Collection<Revision> getRevisions()
          Get the versions of the object.
 

Method Detail

getHeadVersionResource

Resource getHeadVersionResource()
Retrieve the content of object from the HEAD revision.

Returns:
Content of HEAD

getRevisions

java.util.Collection<Revision> getRevisions()
Get the versions of the object. The must be sorted in descending order, i.e. HEAD will be in index 0 and the first version @ 'size - 1'th position.

Returns:
All versions for the object, empty if now revisions available.
